headline: L3Harris Provides Next-Generation EO/IR Sensor Systems to Airbus Helicopters for Canadian Police Support
summary: WATERDOWN, Ontario - L3Harris Technologies has been selected to provide its next-generation of WESCAM MXTM-10 electro-optical/infrared sensor systems to Airbus Helicopters Canada. The technology...
